## GitEvents.addListener() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(event: "tag", listener: (tag: TagData) => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | "tag" |  |
|  listener | (tag: [TagData](./node-git-server.tagdata.md)<!-- -->) => void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

## Example

repos.on('tag', function (tag) { ... }

Emitted when somebody does a `git push --tags` to the repo. Exactly one listener must call `tag.accept()` or `tag.reject()`<!-- -->. If there are No listeners, `tag.accept()` is called automatically.
